participant_2.background:
I have a big beard.
My hobbies include pillaging and fine dining.
Its cold where i live.
I like to go fishing on my viking boat.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing, go on adventures, and pillage.
That sounds like fun! I like to draw and play video games.
I've never been good at drawing, but I love video games! What games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but my favorite games are role playing games.
I've never played a role playing game before, but they sound like fun! What are they like?
They're basically games where you create a character and then go on an adventure. You can choose what your character does and how they interact with the world.
That sounds really cool! I might have to try one sometime.
I think you would like it!
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your job. I'm a veterinarian assistant, so I help with surgeries and stuff.
That sounds like a really cool job! I always wanted to be a veterinarian, but I'm not good at math.
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is.
What's your favorite thing about being a veterinarian assistant?
I like getting to help animals. I also like working with my hands and seeing the results of my work.
That's really great.
Yeah, I like it a lot.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day!
You too!
